name: F11-P40VFR-12-CC-21-J – low-noise variable displacement piston pump
description:
• Low noise: approx. 68.5dB(A) [P70V] at pressure, 21 MPa and speed, 1800 min-1. 
  • Offers many types of pump control functions: (single stage, multi-stage, proportional) pressure compensator control, load sensing control, dual pressure dual flow self-pressurized control, electric direct control, etc.  
  • In addition, configurations which include manifold blocks which incorporate various function valves can be mounted at the delivery port, with a capacitor-like function which reduces pulsations are possible which simplify hydraulic circuits and reduce noise. 
  • Pump max. displacement volume – 40 cm3/rev 
  • Pump max. working pressure – 21 MPa 

Note – All standard options are omitted from the product model number.

Hydraulic fluid

  • Standard – Mineral oil-based fluid 
  • F11 – Water glycol-based fluid 

Pump mounting

  • Standard – Flange mounting 
  • F – Foot mounting

  • L – Left rotation (counter-clockwise)

Pump control method

  • C – Pressure compensator control 
    • Pressure adjustment range – 1.5 ∼21 MPa  
  •  
  • CM – Pressure compensator control 
    • Pressure adjustment range – 1.5 ∼10.5 MPa  
  •  
  • CG – Remote pressure compensator control

  • Standard – Not provided

name: P40VR-12-CCG-11-J – low-noise variable displacement piston pump
description:
• Low noise: approx. 68.5dB(A) [P70V] at pressure, 21 MPa and speed, 1800 min-1. 
  • Offers many types of pump control functions: (single stage, multi-stage, proportional) pressure compensator control, load sensing control, dual pressure dual flow self-pressurized control, electric direct control, etc.  
  • In addition, configurations which include manifold blocks which incorporate various function valves can be mounted at the delivery port, with a capacitor-like function which reduces pulsations are possible which simplify hydraulic circuits and reduce noise. 
  • Pump max. displacement volume – 40 cm3/rev 
  • Pump max. working pressure – 21 MPa 

Note – All standard options are omitted from the product model number.

  • Standard – Mineral oil-based fluid 
  • F11 – Water glycol-based fluid 

Pump mounting

  • Standard – Flange mounting

    • Pressure adjustment range – 1.5 ∼21 MPa
